    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">再不用手写Commit！AI自动总结代码变更，Git提交效率</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2><span><span>背景</span></span></h2>
<p><span>今天写完代码后, commit到git仓库, 让我写提交信息时, 突然发现了些问题</span></p>
<h3><span><span>1、发现git commit 经常很难描述清晰</span></span></h3>
<h3><span>在写后面的message, &nbsp;如:</span></h3>
<p><span>git commit -m "增加了菜单, 修复了跳转bug等"</span></p>
<p><span>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span>只是很简单的概括性描述, 发现, 如果修改代码太多, 那么 -m 后面的信息经常写的不全, 修改内容描述不清.</span></p>
<p><span>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span><span>2、发现项目里很多git commit message 都混乱</span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span>用git log 看了下, &nbsp;大量描述通常如: &nbsp;“fix bug” 、“修复bug”、“增加字段”, 之类, 具经常就是简单几个字描述.&nbsp;<span data-pm-slice="1 1 [&quot;para&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;p&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;u9da2e695&quot;,&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-p&quot;,&quot;style&quot;:&quot;margin: 0; padding: 0; min-height: 24px;&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;},&quot;node&quot;,{&quot;tagName&quot;:&quot;span&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:{&quot;class&quot;:&quot;ne-text&quot;},&quot;namespaceURI&quot;:&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;}]">一看就让人头痛, 不知道具体改了什么,&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span>这种混乱的提交信息, 对后续要寻找修改历史时也带来了负担, &nbsp;基于这些, 是否能用AI帮我总结这块内容呢, &nbsp;于是有了下面这个项目, &nbsp;先给大家直接展示效果.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>
<hr>
<h2><span><span>展示</span></span></h2>
<h2><span><span>a、提交内容</span></span></h2>
<p><span>这里用了个用户的例子展示, 开放个新接口给外部系统查询, &nbsp; 如: 写了个接口,大概内容如下:</span></p>
<p><span>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/323385/202506/323385-20250616092738563-1423452849.png" alt="" width="730" height="373" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/323385/202506/323385-20250616093243117-456206809.jpg" alt="image.png" class="rich_pages wxw-img js_img_placeholder wx_img_placeholder" data-imgfileid="100000182" data-ratio="0.5111111111111111" data-src="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/LVjd13UYhhx9ibKlhcMdP8bmgQrll27pIuwkmnNkQKteTbwPBjMFQFYkkic3GIQsRBFZibWz2Cfss4gsITvNiaEzyw/640?wx_fmt=other&amp;from=appmsg&amp;watermark=1" data-type="other" data-w="1080" data-original-style="null" data-index="1"></span></p>
<h3 data-lake-index-type="0"><span><span><span>b. 用<span><span>GIT提交</span></span></span></span></span></h3>
<p><span>安装完脚本后, 开始测试</span></p>
<pre class="code-snippet__js" data-lang="cs"><code><span>git&nbsp;<span class="code-snippet__keyword">add&nbsp;. &nbsp;<span class="code-snippet__comment">//变更加入暂存区</span></span></span></code></pre>
<p><span>然后直接执行</span></p>
<pre class="code-snippet__js" data-lang="javascript"><code><span>git commit &nbsp;<span class="code-snippet__comment">//提交, 注意: 没带任何说明参数 &nbsp;</span></span></code></pre>
<p>注意这里没执行 -m 参数, AI自动给我总结了我今天的内容, 并提交成功</p>
<p><span>截图看下:</span></p>
<p><span>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/323385/202506/323385-20250616092804191-938466893.png" alt="" width="693" height="129" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/323385/202506/323385-20250616093243117-456206809.jpg" alt="image.png" class="rich_pages wxw-img js_img_placeholder wx_img_placeholder" data-imgfileid="100000183" data-ratio="0.18611111111111112" data-src="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/LVjd13UYhhx9ibKlhcMdP8bmgQrll27pIhCvuOaMzwWGmFaQrEQYdvF7auAKJWiaBiajKKZL2SRGDQyVk7rD6kq9Q/640?wx_fmt=other&amp;from=appmsg&amp;watermark=1" data-type="other" data-w="1080" data-original-style="null" data-index="2"></span></p>
<p><span>AI 帮我总结完成了, 并提交了整个修改的总结. 可以查看下</span></p>
<pre class="code-snippet__js" data-lang="javascript"><code><span>git log &nbsp;<span class="code-snippet__comment">// 查看提交日志进行确认</span></span></code></pre>
<h2><span><span>如下:</span></span></h2>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/323385/202506/323385-20250616092838057-626201140.png" alt="" width="660" height="226" loading="lazy"></p>

<h2><span><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/323385/202506/323385-20250616093243117-456206809.jpg" alt="image.png" class="rich_pages wxw-img js_img_placeholder wx_img_placeholder" data-imgfileid="100000184" data-ratio="0.3425925925925926" data-src="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/LVjd13UYhhx9ibKlhcMdP8bmgQrll27pIJjXCuoEW9I8cxvbhUSEkGl2aplLicAbbB1TmjfndKLYD6Y0JsOjuEGA/640?wx_fmt=other&amp;from=appmsg&amp;watermark=1" data-type="other" data-w="1080" data-original-style="null" data-index="3"></span></h2>
<p><span><span>完美! &nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p><span><span>已经自动完成对变更对总结, 并填充到了git commit message里面.</span></span></p>
<p><span><span>下面把小工具开源出来, 大家可以试试.</span></span></p>
<h2><span>&nbsp;</span></h2>
<hr>
<h2 data-lake-index-type="0"><span><span>安装使用</span></span></h2>
<p><span>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span><span>项目地址:</span></span></p>
<p><span>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span>上传到了github上面, 可以直接下载</span></p>
<p><span>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span>https://github.com/bensonHe/auto-git-commit-message</span></p>
<p><span>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span>具体如:&nbsp;</span></p>
<h3 data-lake-index-type="0"><span>&nbsp;</span></h3>
<h3 data-lake-index-type="0"><span><span><span>a.&nbsp;<span><span>把项目下下来&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></h3>
<pre class="code-snippet__js" data-lang="bash"><code><span>git&nbsp;<span class="code-snippet__built_in">clone&nbsp;git@github.com:bensonHe/auto-git-commit-message.git<br><br></span></span></code></pre>
<h3 data-lake-index-type="0" data-pm-slice="3 3 []"><span><span><span>b. 准备好token</span></span></span></h3>
<p><span>去阿里云百炼大模型, 注册个API Key &nbsp;(目前免费, 我一直用这个, 免费送了很多token, 感谢阿里云)</span></p>
<p><span>打开百炼控制台, &nbsp;<span>https://bailian.console.aliyun.com/</span></span></p>
<p><span>比如我的:</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/323385/202506/323385-20250616093014599-245789236.png" alt="" width="740" height="113" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<h3 data-lake-index-type="0" data-pm-slice="3 3 []"><span><span>直接运行项目里面的 ./install.sh&nbsp;</span></span></h3>
